description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, adolescents, particularly girls, their families and communities adopt key healthy and protective behaviours and are engaged in the development process.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Community for Development and community engagement strategies were used to provide immediate life saving information, promote preventive and protective practices including Prevention of Sexual Explotation and Abuse (PSEA) and seek feedback from affected population. Across the two affected provinces, some 1 million people were reached through different platforms and most families in resettlement areas were reached and engaged through outreach efforts. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2020
